languages.text: {n}Рука бродяги стремительно тянется к оружию... и останавливается, когда бедолага понимает, что сам отдал его вам. На его уродливом лице возникает плаксивая гримаса.{/n} "Облапошили меня, да? Не надо... Что я вам сделал-то?"

{n}The beggar reaches for his weapon... and stops when he realises he gave it to you. His repulsive face displays a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Got one over on me, eh? Don't hurt me... What'd I ever do to you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Рука бродяги стремительно тянется к оружию... и останавливается, когда бедолага понимает, что сам отдал его вам. На его уродливом лице возникает плаксивая гримаса.{/n} "Облапошили меня, да? Не надо... Что я вам сделал-то?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The vagabond reaches for his weapon... and stops when he realises he gave it to you. His repulsive face becomes a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Duped me, didn'tcha? Please don't hurt me... What did I ever do to you?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.locale_text: {n}The vagabond reaches for his weapon... and stops when he realises he gave it to you. His repulsive face becomes a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Duped me, didn'tcha? Please don't hurt me... What did I ever do to you?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.locale_text: {n}The beggar reaches for his weapon... and stops when he realises he gave it to you. His repulsive face exudes a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Duped me, didn'tcha? Please don't hurt me... What did I ever do to you?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.locale_text: {n}The beggar reaches for his weapon... and stops when he realises he gave it to you. His repulsive face displays a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Got one over on me, eh? Don't hurt me... What'd I ever do to you?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.locale_text: {n}The beggar reaches for his weapon... and stops when he realises he gave it to you. His repulsive face displays a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Got one over on me, eh? Don't hurt me... What'd I ever do to you?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}乞食は武器に手を伸ばし…そしてそれをあなたに渡したことに気づいて立ち止まる。その嫌悪に満ちた顔からは、いびつな不機嫌さが滲み出ている。{/n}「あんたのほうが一枚上手だったな。お願いだ、見逃してくれ…俺があんたに何したってんだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar reaches for his weapon... and stops when he realises he gave it to you. His repulsive face displays a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Got one over on me, eh? Don't hurt me... What'd I ever do to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}乞食は武器に手を伸ばし…そしてそれをあなたに渡したことに気づいて立ち止まる。その嫌悪に満ちた顔からは、いびつな不機嫌さが滲み出ている。{/n}「あんたのほうが一枚上手だったな。お願いだ、見逃してくれ…俺があんたに何したってんだ？」
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}乞丐伸手去拿武器……随后他意识到，他已经把武器交给你了。他那张令人厌恶的丑脸上露出了痛苦的鬼脸。{/n}“我上当了，是吧？求求你，别伤害我……我对你做过什么坏事吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar reaches for his weapon... and stops when he realises he gave it to you. His repulsive face displays a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Got one over on me, eh? Don't hurt me... What'd I ever do to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}乞丐伸手去拿武器……随后他意识到，他已经把武器交给你了。他那张令人厌恶的丑脸上露出了痛苦的鬼脸。{/n}“我上当了，是吧？求求你别伤害我……我对你做过什么坏事吗？”
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}El mendigo coge su arma... y se detiene al darse cuenta de que te la ha dado a ti. Su rostro repulsivo emana una mueca de lloriqueo.{/n} «Me la ha jugado, ¿eh? No me haga daño... No le he hecho nada».
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar reaches for his weapon... and stops when he realises he gave it to you. His repulsive face displays a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Got one over on me, eh? Don't hurt me... What'd I ever do to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El mendigo coge su arma... y se detiene al darse cuenta de que te la ha dado a ti. Su rostro repulsivo emana una mueca de lloriqueo.{/n} «Me la ha colado, ¿eh? No me haga daño, por favor... No le he hecho nada».
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Der Bettler greift nach seiner Waffe ... und stutzt, als er erkennt, dass er sie dir überlassen hat. Er verzieht sein abstoßendes Gesicht zu einer weinerlichen Grimasse.{/n} "Ihr seid im Vorteil, hm? Tut mir nichts ... Was habe ich Euch je getan?"
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar reaches for his weapon... and stops when he realises he gave it to you. His repulsive face displays a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Got one over on me, eh? Don't hurt me... What'd I ever do to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Bettler greift nach seiner Waffe ... und hält inne, als ihm einfällt, dass er sie ja dir gegeben hat. Sein widerwärtiges Gesicht verkommt zu einer weinerlichen Grimasse.{/n} "Da habt Ihr mich wohl reingelegt, was? Bitte tut mir nicht weh ... Was habe ich Euch je getan?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Le mendiant tend une main vers son arme... avant de se rappeler qu'il vous l'a donnée. Son visage répugnant se tord en une grimace pleurnicheuse.{/n} « Je me suis fait avoir, on dirait. Pitié, me faites pas de mal... Qu'est-ce que je vous ai fait pour mériter ça ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar reaches for his weapon... and stops when he realises he gave it to you. His repulsive face displays a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Got one over on me, eh? Don't hurt me... What'd I ever do to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mendiant tend une main vers son arme... avant de se rappeler qu'il vous l'a donnée. Son visage répugnant se tord en une grimace pleurnicheuse.{/n} « Je me suis fait avoir, on dirait. Pitié, me faites pas de mal... Qu'est-ce que je vous ai fait pour mériter ça ? »
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Dilenci, silahına uzanmaya kalksa da tabancasını sana verdiğini hatırlayıp vazgeçiyor. İtici yüzünü üzgün bir şekilde buruşturuyor.{/n} "Beni oyuna getirdin. Canımı yakma... Sana yanlış yapmadım ya."
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar reaches for his weapon... and stops when he realises he gave it to you. His repulsive face displays a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Got one over on me, eh? Don't hurt me... What'd I ever do to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dilenci, silahına uzanıyor ama sonra sana verdiğini hatırlayıp vazgeçiyor. İtici yüzünü üzgün bir şekilde buruşturuyor.{/n} "Oyuna geldim, değil mi? Canımı yakma... Sana bir yanlışım oldu mu?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain
